Name: Heather
comment: Visiting from out of the area, so glad I went to this place! Super clean and friendly and got me in and out. Highly impressed with this place!

Name: T. B.
comment: Beautiful nail salon that is extremely clean and takes necessary precautions from Covid. Friendly staff from the time you enter to the time you leave. Reasonably priced. Definitely recommend.

Name: Christinaa
comment: The place is so clean and nice. Did a wonderful job on my nails best I have had..

Name: Abbie Meekd
comment: Wow!! Stopped in to this oasis for a lavender pedicure and tried a dip manicure w/ tips for the first time. Super impressed and the nail artists were so friendly and nice!! Canâ€™t wait to come back.

Name: Hayley F
comment: Really great experience so I had to share in a review! Both mani and pedi were easily 10/10. Regular pedi and a Shellac manicure - will absolutely be back.

Name: cheryl barenberg
comment: Very nice/new nail salon.  Neat, clean and very nice techs. Will go again.
